entries.title: Smear campaign targets nominee who would be FCC's first openly gay commissioner
entries.description: A campaign to block the appointment of a commissioner to the Federal Communications Commission has turned ugly.

entries.title: Activision Blizzard pays SEC $35 million to settle probe
entries.description: Video game developer Activision Blizzard agreed to pay a $35 million settlement over charges it failed to maintain “adequate” workplace harassment reporting procedures and that it violated federal whistleblower protection rules, the Securities and Exchange Commission said Friday.
